channel.title: Colin Marshall - Web Developer
channel.description: My name is Colin Marshall and I'm a web developer. Welcome to my blog! Here I will discuss projects I'm working on, and technologies I'm learning about.

item.title: Why I Chose Jekyll Over WordPress For This Blog
item.description:
I have built many WordPress sites over the years. I will be wrapping up a WordPress theme soon which I will blog about that theme later on, once I get the layout for this blog finished.

Since I already have something WordPress related that will be in my portfolio, I figured that I could kill two birds with one stone and create a blog that demonstrates my ability to use a different framework and add it to my portfolio.

item.title: Hello, World! Welcome To My Blog
item.description:
console.log("hello, world");

Thanks for stopping by! I will be updating this blog as I build my Web Development Portfolio. My goal is to land a job as a Front-End Developer in the coming months. The purpose of this blog is to document my work so others can see the technologies Iâ€™m learning and using.
